website_summaries.verdict: You can't beat this boat fender if you're looking for something that's sturdy and dependable.
pros: Sturdy construction that resists puncturing and tearing
Boaters say they still look like new even years after purchase
cons: Some customers say they were smaller than expected, so make sure to pay attention to the size measurements

customer_reviews.title: 4+ years old and still like new
customer_reviews.text: I started off buying a few of these fenders to try them out and I keep adding to them. They are extremely durable to the harsh conditions of the Hudson River, plus the color has not faded. My oldest fenders are around 4 or 5 years old and they still look like new. The saltwater hasn't hurt these fenders, nor has the constant slamming around (the river is choppy and these bumpers take a real beating). These fenders are die hard and take a beating. 4+ years in the sun and they still haven't faded.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy them too large. Use G-3 or G-4 for a 18' to 23' boat
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in the G4 size based on another review. These G4 sized fenders were a bit larger than I expected yet work very well. For an 21' or smaller boat you'll really only need two. One in the middle and one on the stern. On my 19.5' bow rider I can get away with only one, right in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: William D

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Boat Fender
customer_reviews.text: I bought this boat fender for my husband's 34 foot Mainship Pilot. He is an avid boater and fisherman, and also very picky about what products he uses on his boat. He said that the fender was of excellent quality and just the right size for his boat. Great protection against the docks where he keeps his boat. In fact, hubby is hinting that he would like another one. It does come in different colors, but he likes the traditional white. So glad I was able to purchase a quality product for my husband's favorite hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Jane W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tying up to docks!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use with my new bass boat when tying up to docks. These are the soft vinyl that will not scratch gel-coat. In the past I had a set of cheap ones that were harder vinyl, after being tied to the dock for a few hours waiting for take off in a tournament, the wakes coming in caused the boat buoy to mare up the gel-coat. These won't!
customer_reviews.author: HuntingAngler

customer_reviews.title: So far, they are Great.
customer_reviews.text: If your tired of fenders that get flat or deflate, you'll be glad to find these have valves for inflation. You can be in charge of the pressure you desire, and for me that is a big plus. I've had so many fenders that deflate or lose air through the membrane in high heat/pressure conditions, I was happy to find these had a way to firm them back up. Nice colors and price point don't hurt either.
customer_reviews.author: C. Druitt

customer_reviews.title: Venomous insect (Spider) was in the the packaging wen we opened it !
customer_reviews.text: When we opened the packaging . My wife was bitten by a venomous spider. We are hoping she won't loose her thumb. WEAR GLOVES WHEN OPENING YOUR PACKAGES. LOVE THE FENDERS
customer_reviews.author: Navigator

customer_reviews.title: I gave it 4 stars due to not using them yet., and........
customer_reviews.text: I love the color they match my boat well. I like the hole size for the rope. I love I don't have to inflate them. I like that they seem durable. I don't like the smell, very chemical like. I don't like the fact they still smell hanging up in my garage for over 2 months Overall I like them, but not looking forward to the smell in the box they're gonna be stored in on my boat.
customer_reviews.author: Psychofisherman

customer_reviews.title: Made from good material.
customer_reviews.text: Hi everyone I did some measurements to try to help others in a faster way posible,, if you're looking for a Jetski size I will recommend size G-1, it will go perfectly with a jetski, I purchased two of them to protect my jetski as much as posible from scratches when leaving it at docks. If you have a bigger boat then you must go with a BIGGER size. My comment it's base on the right size for a jetski. Hope this helps other.
customer_reviews.author: Chris De La

customer_reviews.title: Have confidence in these
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the added protection of the G series larger size fenders for a 23ft Cobalt. Put two out for the launch and then again to dock with never a scratch to the ship. And you know how poorly maintained some of these docks can be. Two is all you need unless you want one more handy for the idiot trying to maneuver beside you :)
customer_reviews.author: Homie

customer_reviews.title: Great for pontoon boats!
customer_reviews.text: Great for pontoon boats !! Fits under seats too. Shipping very fast too.
customer_reviews.author: G. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: You won't be sorry ordering these. They are a little more money than some others, but that's because you get what you pay. These are great quality and happy to come in a color that will match my boat. I had a hard time figuring out which size to buy for our Parti Kraft Pontoon and the G3's are perfect. I would suggest sticking with G3's if you have a 21' pontoon like myself. Anything bigger, would have been way too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Arrived inflated and ready to go!
customer_reviews.text: The quality appears as good as West Marine products, at a great price. Time will tell on durability in the Florida sun, but pleased so far. One niggle would be that it would be nice to include an inflator - even for a small increase in price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Brisbourne

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and really nice product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the G3 19" for our 20' open bow I/O boat. Works great and perfect size. I like the fact you can adjust the air / tightness as one came a little flat. Good looks on the boat and works very well around the dock.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: I love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting good quality or to be impressed with such inexpensive bumpers, but these are fantastic!!!! Same great quality as the one I bought at the marine supply store. I am shocked color makes such a big difference in pricing, but since I don't care about the color, I am thrilled to get my hands on the bumpers for so cheap! Really high quality!!
customer_reviews.author: erin redfield

customer_reviews.title: Mine leak air pretty bad.
customer_reviews.text: 50% chance these thing are goin to hold air. I bought 4 and two of them leak the air out fast. Not up to my expectations for keeping an expensive boat away from a dock or when tieing up to other boats. The picture was taken about 10 minutes after blowing this one up firm.
customer_reviews.author: Adam in kc

customer_reviews.title: Polyform is best!
customer_reviews.text: After 25 years in the marine industry, I can tell you that Polyform makes the best boat fenders available. Other brands have needle valves, like a basketball, that leak. Polyform’s flap valve, with a secondary plastic flat head screw seal, never leak. Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: P. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible for indoor use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for indoor use. Bad idea because it smells horrible in a chemical way. I also ordered a second one in the next size up (G2) in a different color and it has no smell. Not sure if size or color matter but I find that interesting. #JustSharing
customer_reviews.author: MikeDidIt

customer_reviews.title: Look no further, these are the ones!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these! I bought 7 for my boat (one we somehow lost so I had to buy a replacement) they match our boat perfectly and we get tons of comments on them. Work great.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and so far durable
customer_reviews.text: These fenders look really good on my hurricane boat and are doing a great job in keeping my boat away from the dock. Only time will tell on their durability
customer_reviews.author: New York

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty to handle the job!
customer_reviews.text: These heavy duty G5 bumpers are perfect for our 22’ tritoon! Ordered 2 more I was so pleased. They are heavy...but it’s a good sized not with a long side so they are what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the boat and little children's heads
customer_reviews.text: I Like em. Perfect size for my 22' boat. Heavy duty and stay inflated. They make great pillows for the kids on the long ride back. Color stays on, didn't run or rub off
customer_reviews.author: J. Boice

customer_reviews.title: Nice bumper, good value.
customer_reviews.text: Just received two of these, and I've used them once already. They provide excellent protection and look nice. I like the fact that you can get it in a color to match your boat.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Novak

customer_reviews.title: Polyform QUALITY A-plus rating
customer_reviews.text: So very happy with our Polyform fenders. These are quality through and through. As are the Fender Covers, which we have ordered as well. Will always order this brand of fenders and covers for our boat. Great service, fast shipping and outstanding quality.
customer_reviews.author: CheetahGirl

customer_reviews.title: A must for pontoons
customer_reviews.text: We have a 22 ft pontoon and these are a must for tying up with other boats. Great color and have worked well on our docks for added protection when docking. This is the 3rd set we have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Chloebell

customer_reviews.title: I did not receive inflation adapters
customer_reviews.text: I just finally pulled these out of the box to start using them. There are no adapters in the packaging to inflate them. I wish I had known that before ordering, and I would have gotten one. They do seem to be good quality. I just can't blow them up properly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea I. Gross

customer_reviews.title: They work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This is an improved version of the same fenders I bought 25 years ago. The first set gradually went flat after the first 20 years of service. These new ones have ports that will allow the addition of air............no more flat fenders. :)
customer_reviews.author: Phil Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these boat fenders from Amazon. With Covid going on I sure wish I had the money back
customer_reviews.text: These boat fenders were totally almost the size of my hand where they betray them to be the bigger ones like you need on your dock. Very disappointed with Amazon again showing something that is not what it is and selling it. I was stuck at home with Covid and could not return them so now stuck with three dinky things that I can’t use. I sure could use that money during these hard times
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR MY ELECTRIC BOAT
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 18' Duffy Electric Boat! Great quality and not rigid like some of the fenders I have purchased in the past. Great value !
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fischbeck

customer_reviews.title: great fenders
customer_reviews.text: We have used this style of fender exclusively for years for our ski boat. Occasionally we lose them and have to replace them. Have never had one go flat or bad on us.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Gee

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as extras to use to protect our boat in a boat parade. They look great and work great.
customer_reviews.author: tloibl

customer_reviews.title: Best value on quality boat fenders
customer_reviews.text: The G-4’s fit perfectly in the Cobalt 282 fender storage locker. I’m also using two SuperGard 8.5 x 26 and wouldn’t hesitate to get some G5’s to pair them up. Better value than Taylor made Super Gard and the quality seem just as good.
customer_reviews.author: dnguyen

customer_reviews.title: Depends on the size you buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought G3 fenders prior to these, although they were too big, they allowed you to add air to them. The G2s do not; I didnt see anywhere it states this in the description. To add to the lack of air valve, one of the two I bought is under-inflated. A bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: akt

customer_reviews.title: Best price ! Great dog toy
customer_reviews.text: Our lab loves these as a toy! Tie a rope to it and she’ll play with it for days - just watch my video for proof 😂
customer_reviews.author: Aremac

customer_reviews.title: Great product, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Love these polyform bumper's, don't have to worry about going flat, work as advertised, sturdy, would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paisano

customer_reviews.title: It does one job -- and does it well
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to pick the right size for your boat and dock situation.
customer_reviews.author: Elmo

customer_reviews.title: Nice fenders
customer_reviews.text: Nice fenders. Not much else you can say. They do want they're supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Lake Living

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted and needed for our Jon Boat rebuild.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yeah Bouy
customer_reviews.text: I like the color. Got an open box one so was super cheap too.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Alper

customer_reviews.title: Arrived completely deflated
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4. One arrived completely flat. The other 3 have worked well so far
customer_reviews.author: DrBiff

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues
customer_reviews.text: One of the 2 pack ruptured the first time i used it. Looks like a wrinkle or seam line near one end. so totally deflated and worthless. On the other hand the 2nd one works just fine and matches color of my boat. If quality was a little more reliable would make these a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond H Ackley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected and doesn’t break the bank like Taylor Made brand
customer_reviews.author: PFM

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have purchased very expensive boat fenders and then these. These are equal to the expensive brands. Just buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Timbertrail

customer_reviews.title: Smallest fender I could find.
customer_reviews.text: It's the smallest fender I could find for a little sailing dinghy I have. No lines are included and they aren't inflatable but seem to be made well otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Hoffman Sr

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive fenders
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the G-3 size of these fenders when they were on sale, but even at their regular price they are still cheaper than what I could find locally. With Prime Two day shipping it was a great deal. These fenders are very attractive and will compliment any boat when you get them in a color to match your boat.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Poping color
customer_reviews.text: Get the boat today, will tell more after Have tried.
customer_reviews.author: leon massey

customer_reviews.title: Fending off lifes bumps.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the size & value of these fenders.
customer_reviews.author: Lowcountry LawMan

customer_reviews.title: They Work Great
customer_reviews.text: These were for my 17' Day Sailer. At first I thought they were a little small but then felt they were just the right size. I keep 4 of these on the boat for docking and emergency floatation.
customer_reviews.author: Jemiah A.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Perfect size. Works great on my Yamaha 212
customer_reviews.author: Rhyne

customer_reviews.title: Good boat fenders
customer_reviews.text: Same fenders as you can get at West Marine, Defender, etc. for a lower delivered price. Quick shipping. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Sailor

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought I ordered but reused them for our jet ski instead of the boat and they serve their purpose well. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Whit Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have 6 of these, two different sizes. A little expensive, but worth it and still not as expensive as some of the others. I tried going cheap last time with a generic brand and had to return them and buy more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for to protect our boat. Like the color and size. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Works good. Nice size using 3 on a 25ft boat
customer_reviews.text: helps protect my boat at the raft up partys. Works good. Nice size using 3 on a 25ft boat.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler - MD

customer_reviews.title: Durability and function
customer_reviews.text: Price was good too soon to tell about durability just put the boat in the water yesterday but from the looks of it and the other bumpers and buoys that are out this looks like a good product
customer_reviews.author: tim cline

customer_reviews.title: Great Size for 22' Pontoon Boat
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and effective. Glad i bought them for my new to me Pontoon Boat. Looks much better than the beat up whote ones that came with the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred R. Wall

customer_reviews.title: Great size fender for a bass boat!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a smaller fender for my boat. This fender fits the bill. Larger enough to provide protection small enough to store easily...
customer_reviews.author: M E from KC

customer_reviews.title: My Boat
customer_reviews.text: These bumpers are great! They are small enough to stow and great at the docks to protect the boat! Love the color Blue
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 3 and only 2 hold air
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 and only 2 hold air. Due to COVID-19 and boating being shut down, I wasn't able to make use of them before my window to return closed on me. So, I'm stuck with a flat one. The two are fine, but I'm really dissappointed about 1/3 of my order being a dud!
customer_reviews.author: DEBORAH DIETRICH

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this fender is very good for the money. It seems it will last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: yvonne Craigo

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size! Definitely puts some space between my 23’ tritoon and the dock or when tying up to other boats. Good quality and has held up during several storms. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: MissG

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy well made. Works great. Should last the life of my new boat. Bought the red color and they look sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Lee from PA

customer_reviews.title: Boat fender
customer_reviews.text: Was a lot smaller than I expected....not as big as my other one I have...and they both measure the same....I'm wondering if there could have been a labeling mistake?
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Good all around fenders
customer_reviews.text: Had 4 on pontoon boat corners but needed 2 more due to tight culvert (6" clearance on either side). Smacked the side & put a slight dent in pontoon on a windy day. The additional fenders midship would have prevented that contact. Our previous 4 have survived years of strong sun and flotilla mooring, can't beat the quality.
customer_reviews.author: RLR

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: You can tell when you receive these and open them up they are high quality. Very happy with the purchase and would buy again
customer_reviews.author: DMMc

customer_reviews.title: great sized fender for a bass boat
customer_reviews.text: great sized fender for a bass boat - color as shown, sturdy and well made.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, standard boat bumper.
customer_reviews.text: As expected,good price and they will save the paint job on my boat. I have a 20 foot ski boat and these worked great!
customer_reviews.author: The Fair Critic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great quality - these held up well this summer when getting banged up against the dock.

customer_reviews.title: very happy, so glad I read the review to go ...
customer_reviews.text: very happy, so glad I read the review to go with a larger bumper. The quality is excellent, no fading or flattening so far

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: Work great i use them as kayak outriggers fpr stabikity to be able to stand and fish.
customer_reviews.author: S.Day

customer_reviews.title: Great dog toys!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dogs to play with. The vinyl is a lil too soft. So not great for power chewers. But will buy a firmer material one ASAP for my one power chewer!
customer_reviews.author: Pinkness915

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: packaged well and is perfect for keeping a 22' sailboat off the dock
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing deal. The quality is outstanding and a great value this is a larger fender than most and provides additional protection against scrapes and scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great Boat Fenders
customer_reviews.text: Great boat fenders to protect your boat, but they will fade in color.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: These fenders are as described, have been put to ...
customer_reviews.text: These fenders are as described, have been put to the test, and had no problem keeping my boat away from walls, or other boats.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Boat Bumpers
customer_reviews.text: We have teal boat canvas and wanted bumpers to match that were heavy duty. These work great.

customer_reviews.title: Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: Not too rigid and allows for molding around boat edge to protect from hitting the dock.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer support
customer_reviews.text: Well made, and colorfast. Will not fade or deflate. The industry for many, many years. Excellent customer support. Would I buy again? Yes, in a heartbeat!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fender
customer_reviews.text: The fender works good and I like the adjustable air pressure and the color choices.

customer_reviews.title: Need to be slightly larger
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were slightly larger. Doesn’t quite do the trick of keeping my skiff off the dock.

customer_reviews.text: This boat fender smells terrible. I have it setting outside hoping the smell will go away.

customer_reviews.title: These are well made and the color matches perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted fenders to match our new pontoon boat. These are well made and the color matches perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my 21ft hurricane SD 217. Perfect size and very nice quality. The G5s were way too big.

customer_reviews.title: I want another one!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I wanted...I WANTED to order TWO but it would only let me order one :(

customer_reviews.title: Great Fender for certain docks
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this sideways at the end of my dock midway between the pilings which are 12 feet apart. Easily done with 1/2"-5/8" rope and appropriate clips. It is the greatest thing since sliced bread for keeping my 26" boat from bashing into the dock when we come in. It would be a great fender to carry on larger boats for docking away from home (Or perhaps at home)
customer_reviews.author: FishinDan49Top Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Fender does the job. Pleased with the look. Time will tell if they hold up to UV.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: ... little lighter than my boat but they still look good. These are bigger than my old fenders but ...
customer_reviews.text: The teal is a little lighter than my boat but they still look good. These are bigger than my old fenders but they still store nicely and they provide much better protection. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: p22345

customer_reviews.title: Seem good
customer_reviews.text: Smelled kind of nasty, but I guess it's a manufaturing detail. It'll be the summer before I can say how they perform.

customer_reviews.title: 19ft jet boat
customer_reviews.text: We have a 19ft jet boat, and these are perfect! We bought 2 and that is enough to get the job done.

customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 18' bowrider, they are a bit small, but are nice since they don't take up a lot of room and they still do the job.

customer_reviews.text: Works as a boat fender would. Good for an 18ft walk around boat

customer_reviews.text: Works great on a small boat, but not for a pwc

customer_reviews.text: Nice uniform color, size and appearance of material and construction, and does not seem too thin like some. Still in the package so far though.

customer_reviews.text: Just the size needed to keep our kayaks from scraping on the sea wall barnacles. Fits in the kayak behind the seats. Great price also.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in all respects...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for (had two already)... The shipping was timely and the price was reasonable. Great product that works well for a 16-foot boat.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and do the job. These are just the right size for my 19.5 foot ski boat.

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with these! Haven’t used them yet. They look and feel like nice quality!

product_meta.title: Polyform G-4 Boat Fender White
product_meta.description: Polyform’s G Series boat fender has raised the bar for quality and appearance in utility fenders. Subscribing to the philosophy that quality does not have to cost more, we include ribs for extra strength, inflation valves for larger sizes and reinforced ropeholds for long-term durability. The versatile G Series fender comes in a variety of Polyform colors, enabling you to create the look you want for your boat.
feature_bullets: A general purpose value boat fender made by Polyform and manufactured in the USA
G-4 fenders are recommended for boats between 20 and 30 ft. in length
Designed for recreational trailered boats in protected moorings
G-4 boat fenders measure 6.5 in. diameter and 22 in. tall with an eye diameter of 0.75 in.
This fender ships as a single unit pre-inflated with a Polyform inflation valve to adjust pressure

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
